open.title: Frogfoot Degraded Service | Johannesburg Partial
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting parts of Johannesburg, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Areas affected by the outage include:
Klerksdorp, Rustenburg, Samcor Park, Polokwane, Middelburg, Bryanston, Hendrina, Kempton Park, Fairlands, Westbury, Tzaneen, Westgate, Orlando, Turffontein, Soweto, Randfontein, Lephalale, Senderwood, Heidelberg, Johannesburg CBD, Marlboro, Randburg, Vanderbijlpark, Rivonia, Midrand, Samrand, Centurion, Faerie Glen

open.title: FrogFoot maintenance | Richards Bay, George and Ermelo
open.description: FrogFoot is conducting maintenance on their infrastructure on the 15th of June from 07:00 to the 26th of June at 07:30. this will affect users in Richards Bay, George and Ermelo, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
